# {.tabset .tabset-fade}

## **Research path**


I am a biotechnology engineer with concentration in molecular biology, I obtained my degree at [ITESM](https://tec.mx/es) in Mexico. Nowadays, I am doing my PhD degree in Quebec at [UQTR](https://www.uqtr.ca/informationgenerale/english.shtml) in a project directed by [Isabel Desgagné-Penix](https://oraprdnt.uqtr.uquebec.ca/pls/public/gscw031?owa_no_site=3466) and co-directed by [Brian Ingalls](https://uwaterloo.ca/applied-mathematics/people-profiles/brian-ingalls), working on **_The Characterization of vanillin biosynthetic pathway in genetically modified Phaeodactylum tricornutum_**. 

Currently, I am working on the annotation and assembly of the transcriptome of *Leucojum aestivum*. Additionally, I have worked with metagenomics data to assign taxonomy to microbial populations from environmental samples in Mexico, analyzing differential compositions depending on crop and developmental stage.
